text: Whiteshield is a global advisory firm specialized in public policy and AI economics, headquartered in London, UK. In 2023, it launched Global Trade Resilience Index, indicating the economies which best withstand external trade shocks. == History == Whiteshield Partners was founded in London, in 2011. Later, it opened offices in Dubai in 2013, Astana in 2015, and Riyadh in 2019. In January 2019, Whiteshield launched the Global Labour Resilience Index (GLRI), presented in Davos every year alongside the World Economic Forum. In 2020, Whitshield developed its AI economics, big data and academy capabilities. In 2021, the company launched the Global Public Policy Competition to accelerate the recruitment of high-potential students and engage in global dialogue. Whiteshield also cooperates with the UN. == References ==
title: Whiteshield
